name: Hraesvelgr
description: Hraesvelgr is a massive titan giant that can shift between a towering form and that of a colossal roc, characterized by immense size and notable strength.
memorable: Hraesvelgr can control weather and unleash devastating attacks, making it a versatile and formidable opponent.
goals: Hraesvelgr seeks to dominate the battlefield with its strength and weather manipulation, while also intimidating foes.
relations: Hraesvelgr may be associated with other giant creatures or titans, often serving as a master over lesser beings.
environment: Typically found in mountainous or stormy areas where it can influence the weather.
strengths: Exceptionally strong and durable, with immunity to cold and nonmagical attacks, and can control weather conditions.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks and has limited speed when flying.
attacks: Hraesvelgr can attack with its beak, fists, or talons, and unleash powerful gale blasts with thunderous effects.
most_powerful_ability: Swallowing opponents, inflicting blindness, restraining, and dealing ongoing acid damage.
senses: Hraesvelgr possesses keen sight when in roc form, granting it enhanced perception abilities.
skills: It has impressive proficiency in athletics, perception, and survival, allowing it to excel in physical feats and battlefield awareness.
additional_information: Possesses legendary resistance to overcome failed saving throws.
Can unleash a potent sudden gust attack to push enemies away.
Employs a multiattack option to target multiple foes effectively.
May use ear-splitting screeches to cause deafening damage to nearby creatures.
Can change shape between giant and roc forms seamlessly.
test_queries: massive giant that controls the weather
titan that changes into a colossal bird
creature that uses thunder damage and grapples
powerful giant with keen eyesight and weather manipulation
